name: Brent's Sound Museum
description:
This is an experimental game where you can listen to my music, learn about each piece, and you can learn about me as a composer. Here are the buttons for playing:

Arrow Keys or WSAD to move

Mouse to look

Q to quit

P to pause

Shift to sprint

I am still working out bugs and such, please let me know if you run into anything weird or have any feedback. Thank you for checking it out!
